mapper.select: select deductCode, deductName, useStatus, relate, taxstatus, bonusstatus,establishcode,deprostatus from de_product_div
select deductCode, deductName, useStatus, relate, taxstatus, bonusstatus,establishcode,deprostatus from de_product_div where deductCode = #{deductCode}
select deductCode, deductName, useStatus, relate, taxstatus, bonusstatus,establishcode,deprostatus from de_product_div where deprostatus=#{deprostatus}
mapper.insert: insert into de_product_div (deductCode, deductName, useStatus, relate, taxstatus, bonusstatus,establishcode,deprostatus) values (#{deductCode},#{deductName},#{useStatus},nvl(#{relate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null), nvl(#{taxStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null), nvl(#{bonusStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null), nvl(#{establishcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null), #{deprostatus})
mapper.select: select deductCode, deductName, useStatus, relate, taxstatus, bonusstatus,establishcode from de_product_div where deductName like '%'||#{deductName}||'%' and deprostatus=#{deprostatus}
mapper.update: update de_product_div set deductName=#{deductName} , useStatus=nvl(#{useStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,useStatus) , relate=nvl(#{relate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,relate) , taxstatus=nvl(#{taxStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,taxStatus) , bonusstatus=nvl(#{bonusStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},bonusStatus) , establishcode=nvl(#{establishcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},establishcode) where deductCode=#{deductCode}
